column4: Can anyone help me install Ubuntu using a liveCD on my Asus m50vm-b1. When I mount it and restart my computer I get the ubuntu load screen and then it says something about Busybox 1.02
haven't played with the Asus yet.  Should have an option when booting to boot from CD and should give you an option (menu) to load up livecd
sorry i haven't ever been stuck there.  sorry i can't be more helpful
